tweet: What you look like on an interview does matter. Find out the tricks: http://bit.ly/59c7qu
Resume Tip #1: Don't put hobbies, family, or other personal info on your resume, unless it directly relates to the job you're appyling for.
Resume Tip #2: How your resume is formatted matters. It should be neat, clean, and not cutsey. Take the time to make it the best.
Does the idea of doing your own resume make you nauseous? Leave it to me! http://ow.ly/UQPJ
